seccommerce.smartcard
Interface SmartCardRemovalListener

public interface SmartCardRemovalListener

Classes implementing this interface may be notified by SecSigner when the smart card is taken away from the reader. This interface does not contain the method for card insertion, because the smart card classes shall not be exported from SecSigner.

Version:
$Id: SmartCardRemovalListener.java,v 1.2 2008/09/05 11:07:28 tk Exp $
Author:
SecCommerce Informationssysteme GmbH, Hamburg

Method Summary
 void smartCardRemoved()
          This method is called by SeachSmartCardThread right after a smart card has been removed.
 

Method Detail

smartCardRemoved

void smartCardRemoved()
This method is called by SeachSmartCardThread right after a smart card has been removed.
